title: Friday Post Show (03-04-22)
itunes:title: Friday Post Show (03-04-22)
description:
Bobby starts by reading a post from St. Jude about how the show has raised $17 million over the years…but how there was one weird comment left that he wanted to address. Bobby shares stories behind his BobbyCast. Bobby gets a random call during the show and then talks about how Lifelock covered him recently. A caller presents up with a fun hypothetical question. He also asks why the podcast is now split into different files.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
